title: Intermittent ping problems. Chicago area.
body:
This has only been going on today.

Additional context: When the ping spikes happen, I don't just have slower inputs; the game itself actually skips forward in time, meaning I actually miss anything that happens within the one second or so of time that the ping spike takes. 

I generally sit at 16-17 ping, but today it has been jumping up intermittently to 200-300+ in addition to making me miss a second of time. Whatever happens in that second is lost, but delayed sound effects will play after ping returns to normal.

It's only been happening today.

replies.body: It sounds like you've having a network issue that's causing you to lag spike, and have input delays.  I recommend going over our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide as a first step.  This will tune up your network to make sure it's strong and can maintain a connection.  let me know if you have any issues afterwards!
